name: Samurai Halloween
description:
Tutorial/Controls

  • Press [Z] to mark enemy you are facing.
  • When the timer runs out, press [Z] again to activate attack.
  • Don't get hit. Move with directional arrow keys.

You are a samurai on a mission to stop Halloween from happening too early.
You have a powerful sword capable of killing anything in a single blow. However, it requires ten seconds to charge. Use that time to mark any enemies in front of you.

No sound, so please play your favourite high-energy song on the background.

Good luck <3

Made in Godot Engine 3.5
